law.catch_line: Paraplegic Persons; Municipal Police Or Fire Departments; Appointments

text.section: the title and duties to be assigned to the paraplegic who is to be employed, and the title of his immediate supervisor; and

a certificate from a physician that the paraplegic can satisfactorily perform the duties of the position, is qualified to do the work without hazard to himself or to others and is socially competent to maintain himself in a work environment.
